name: matchstreakodds
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool icehockeyapi.
Tool description: IceHockeyApi offers you real time hockey livescore, tables, statistics, fixtures and results for more than 70 ice hockey leagues, cups and tournaments.
For increased rates and more sports, please look at: https://rapidapi.com/fluis.lacasse/api/allsportsapi2/
API description: Fetch odds data related to streaks for a specific football match using its ID.

is_id.description: The ID of the match for which the streaks odds data is to be retrieved.
